text: leuklengte anak pol tha ai n sha a l laoh(baesencha a l laoh mean chetnea) . chaur anak romluk tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak nowpel na del anak ban phe lch haey chaur anak pol tha sangkhumtha mcheasa robsakhnhom nung changaoulobangheanh khnhom tow rk meakra del troemotrauv chit cheang nih towtiet
